using.from sentence: The following results were obtained using a combination of central processing units ( CPUs ) and graphical processing units ( GPUs ) .

GPU cards.from sentence: The processing was done on a Xeon E5 ? 2640 ( 2.6 GHz ) with 32 cores and 64GB memory , and the GPU cards were N vidia Quadro K620 and N vidia Tesla K20c .

Compute Unified Device Architecture ( CU.from sentence: We implemented our approaches in Python using the Compute Unified Device Architecture ( CUDA ) , which is a parallel computing platform and Application Programming Interface ( API ) model created by N vidia .

Keras and Tensor Flow libraries.from sentence: We also used Keras and Tensor Flow libraries for creating the neural networks , .
